adrFormatAddress: 150 W 92nd St APT BB, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
Amazing place with engaged and committed to kids success teachers. We are very happy we were offered to do EI at Making Milestones. We have PT, OT and speech here. Our daughter started a little over a year ago and she could barely roll over due to her low muscle tone. Now she’s climbing and trying to run. Also her fine motor and communication skills progressed  greatly because of the overall environment  stimulating all areas of development.
Definitely recommend Making Milestones and I always mention it to other parents who are looking for doing therapy in a sensory gym. We look forward to seeing all new milestones our daughter makes here.

originalText.text: My little guy had virtual sessions until we started coming to making milestones, what a huge difference it has made being in person! I have seen so much change and growth in a few months. It took a little while to find the right fit of providers but the staff was very accommodating to our needs, My son (2 years) loves coming and “playing” it’s fun to watch him get so excited and be able to learn and grow so much, through his therapies!

originalText.text: My daughter has received all services here for several years. She makes tremendous strides, has a lot of fun and looks forward to seeing her therapists and friends in the gym! Her therapists are skilled, professional and responsible. They give you feedback about progress made and skills worked on after each session. They are accommodating and diligent. We love Making Milestones - my daughter is always happy to be there and I am more than delighted with her achievements!

originalText.text: Making Milestones was a true godsend to us. My baby's therapists were so supportive and the whole team as a collective is phenomenal!!!!!! If you're lucky to get a slot, run run run with it!!! They're the absolute best in the whole upper west side and worth traveling to even if you're not an uws resident!!!!!!

originalText.text: Completed a level 2 occupational therapy fieldwork at Making Milestones & loved it! Great facility & amazing learning environment whether you are a client, parent of a client, or just a student! All of the therapists across all disciplines treat the children in such a caring, loving, & holistic manner! Love the relationship all of the therapists have with each other & with their clients & their families! Truly an amazing experience here!
